footer.description: Specialists in attic floor insulation. Thanks to the CAE program, your insulation is 100% free.

hero.title: Insulate your attic
hero.description: Thanks to Energy Savings Certificates (CAE), we insulate your attic floor at no cost to you. Reduce your bills by up to 30%.

wizard.title: Are you eligible for the CAE program?
wizard.description: Answer a few simple questions to find out if you can benefit from 100% funded insulation.
wizard.q1: Are you the owner or occupant of the property?
wizard.q2: Does your property have an attic or loft?
wizard.q3: Is your attic floor currently insulated?
wizard.q4: What type of heating does your home have?
wizard.formTitle: Good news! You seem eligible ðŸŽ‰
wizard.formDescription: Leave your details so an advisor can contact you.
wizard.privacyConsent: I accept the {link} and the processing of my data to be contacted.
wizard.successMessage: An advisor will contact you within the next 24 hours to assess your eligibility and schedule a free diagnosis.

why.title: Why insulate your attic floor?
why.description: 30% of your home's heat loss occurs through the roof. Insulating your attic is the most effective and quickest solution.
why.benefit1Desc: Keep your home warm in winter and cool in summer effortlessly.
why.benefit2Desc: Reduce your heating and air conditioning consumption by up to 30%.
why.benefit3Desc: The work is completed in just a few hours, without construction or disruption.
why.benefit4Desc: We use high-density mineral wool with a 25-year warranty.
why.blownDesc: Ideal for hard-to-access attics. Mineral wool is projected evenly across the entire surface.
why.blownFeatures: Fast â€¢ No residue â€¢ Full coverage
why.rolledDesc: Perfect for accessible attics. High-density mineral wool blankets are rolled out.
why.rolledFeatures: Precise thickness â€¢ High density â€¢ Durability

process.title: A simple and transparent process
process.description: From eligibility verification to installation, we support you every step of the way.
process.step1Desc: Answer a few simple questions to see if you meet the CAE program requirements.
process.step2Desc: A technician assesses your attic and explains the process with no obligation.
process.step3Desc: We insulate your attic floor in just a few hours using blowing or rolling techniques.
process.step4Desc: Thanks to the CAE, the work is 100% funded. You pay nothing.

testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.description: Over 2,500 homes have already trusted us.

cta.title: Ready to insulate your home for free?
cta.description: Thanks to Energy Savings Certificates (CAE), your insulation is 100% funded. Don't wait any longer.

hero.title: Let's talk!
hero.description: We're available to answer all your questions about insulation and the CAE program.

form.title: Send us a message
form.description: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.subject: Subject
